name: SMS Cricket Academy
description: A premier cricket academy in Chennai offering both indoor and outdoor facilities, personalized coaching, and community classes catering to all ages and skill levels.

contact.address: Terrace of Ampa Sky Walk, No 1 Nelson Manickam Road, Aminjikarai, Chennai, Tamil Nadu 600029

facilities.name: Indoor & Outdoor Cricket Facilities
facilities.description: Versatile spaces for batting and bowling practice.

facilities.name: Coaching & Training
facilities.description: Expert trainers offering tailored coaching sessions.

facilities.name: Community Classes
facilities.description: Group training sessions to promote community learning.

facilities.name: Free Consultation
facilities.description: Initial free consultation available for new members.
